Item.Value: [Text:Have the monsters nearby been giving you trouble?][Name:1][Default]
[Text:An important job of a travelling healer is to prevent harm as well. I find a solid hit with a heavy stick usually suffices.][Name:2][Default]
[Text:I've always thought that simple meals are the best when traveling.][Name:3][Default]
[Text:Oh... I do hope there's more than just seafood at this Inn.][Name:4][Default]
[Text:Do you know if the Apothecary has Healing Potions in stock? I've run low...][Name:5][Default]
